ml:description.h3: Got some logs you'd like to understand better?

img.style: display: block; border: 2px solid black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: logs

ml:description.p: Please come join us for a presentation from Eric Bloch, MarkLogic community guy. Eric will show how to build a web analytics tool from scratch using Application Builder, Information Studio, and the XSLT support that all come with MarkLogic Server 4.2
If you're coming, please rsvp over at meetup.com so we can bring the right amount of food and drinks. Hope to see you there! Here's a link to the location below.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; border: 2px solid black;
img.title: tivoli student union

ml:details.ml:location: Auraria Campus, Tivoli Bldg (900 Walnut St. Denver CO. 80204) Rm 320 Section A - Baerresen Ballroom
ml:details.ml:topic: Building a Web Analytics Tool with MarkLogic Server 4.2
